basics.name: Weifeng (Ellery) Yu
basics.summary: Master in Computer Science @ UVA. Research: computational neuroimaging, GNNs, brain–behavior modeling. Neurobioinformatics Lab.

work.summary: Mentored by Prof. Aiying Zhang. GNN-based fMRI/behavioral framework (MIDL 2025), INT pipeline (SPIE 2025), trial-wise beta estimation & BSC for task fMRI, CUI data management, lab website & journal club.
highlights: Developed and evaluated GNN-based framework integrating fMRI with behavioral measures; accepted at MIDL 2025
Built intrinsic neural timescale (INT) analysis pipeline on ACE and ABIDE; accepted at SPIE Medical Imaging 2025
Implemented LSS/LSA and beta-series correlation pipelines for task fMRI (SST, MID)
Managed CUI datasets with NIST SP 800-171–aligned handling; maintain lab website and biweekly journal club

work.summary: Mentored by Prof. Qianqian Song. GWAS meta-analysis on irAEs, drug treatment dataset curation, genetic data analysis.
highlights: Contributed to GWAS meta-analysis on immune-related adverse events (irAEs)
Curated drug treatment datasets across cancer types; collaborated on genetic data analysis

work.company: Institute of Societal Contemporary Computing, Wenzhou-Kean University
work.summary: Mentored by Prof. Sujatha Krishnamoorthy. AI/ML for Parkinson's assessment, diabetic retinopathy detection.
highlights: Led student team developing AI/ML methods for Parkinson's (written tasks, voice, gait)
Survey on Parkinson's diagnostics; optimized code for diabetic retinopathy detection project

work.summary: Supervised by Mr. Yuan Wang. Spring Framework information management system, Phone Detection system.
highlights: Developed information management system using Spring Framework
Contributed to Phone Detection "One Line" system; weekly reports and product alignment
